title: WE SHIP WORLDWIDE
body:
WELCOME!

RAVENOUS IS LOCATED IN CAMPINAS, SÃO PAULO (BRAZIL)\ WE SHIP ALL OVER THE WORLD!\ WE RECEIVE PAYMENTS BY PAYPAL. FOR QUESTIONS AND ORDERS PLEASE SEND US AN EMAIL!\ CONTATO@RAVENOUS.COM.BR ATTENTION: INTERNATIONAL SHIPMENTS ARE TEMPORARILY SUSPENDED DUE TO THE COVID-19 PANDEMIC! WHEN THE SHIPMENTS ARE NORMALIZED WE WILL BE INFORMING EVERYONE ON OUR SOCIAL NETWORKS. THANKS FOR UNDERSTANDING ❤️
